overview: Aggressive Inline skating emmerged in the VHS era. In these old video's you can really see the progression of the sport. The first inline skate video was Dare to Air, made in 1993. In this video the skaters are still using 72mm recreational skates and they can barely grind and a few years later the skaters are doing insane combo's on REAL aggressive skates!
title: Steal this Video
